Package org.manathome.totask2.controller

totask2 controller (springMVC).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppController
    main menu.
    InfoController
    admin/info web controller.
    JsonDateSerializer
    gantViewer needs dates in ISO Format during JSON request.
    ProjectController
    admin ui projects
    ProjectPlanController
    project gantt chart rendering (using ganttView).
    TaskAssignmentController
    manage task assignments to users.
    TaskController
    admin ui Tasks.
    UserCollectionEditor
    converting between Collections of User and user.id.
    UserController
    REST controller, used as ajax endpoint providing users data for autocompletion.
    WeekEntryController
    main entry page for uses.
    WorkEntryController
    REST controller providing work data for one day, will be used by totask2.mobile app.

Package org.manathome.totask2.controller Description

totask2 controller (springMVC). springMVC spring controllers.
Since:
2014-11-07
See Also:
http://docs.spring.io/spring/docs/current/spring-framework-reference/html/mvc.html
